screen_home.contacts_description: Validate contacts, family, friends and network
screen_home.phone_number_description: Check if you are talking to the right person

screen_settings.my_profile_description: Edit your name, image and other details
screen_settings.support_feedback_description: We welcome your feedback. Feel free to reach out to us anytime!
screen_settings.delete_account_description: Deleting your account will remove all your data. You'll need to confirm to proceed.
screen_settings.delete_account_confirmation_description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.
screen_settings.delete_account_confirmation_error_messag: An error occurred while deleting your account
screen_settings.delete_account_confirmation_alert_messag: An error occurred while deleting your account
screen_settings.lock_with_pin_description: Secure your app with 'Lock with PIN' for faster access next time, or log out completely to require your email and password for the next login.

screen_profile_edit.edit_profile_description: Edit your name, image and other details
screen_profile_edit.edit_profile_save_changes_button_descrip: Save your changes to your profile

screen_enter_pincode.enter_pincode_description: Enter your PIN code to access your contacts
screen_enter_pincode.enter_pincode_if_no_activity: If there has been no activity for 5 minutes, you must use your PIN code to unlock.

screen_terms_of_service.terms_of_service_description: Before you start using our service, please read and agree to our Terms of Service.
screen_terms_of_service.terms_of_service_error_message: An error occurred while loading the terms of service

screen_onboarding_begin.onboarding_begin_description: To protect your secure contacts, we'll use PIN code verification. We'll guide you step-by-step to set up your profile and security features, ensuring a safe and personalized experience.

screen_onboarding_pin.onboarding_pin_if_inactive: If the app is inactive for 5 minutes, you will need to use this PIN code to access your contacts.

screen_onboarding_pin_confirm.onboarding_pin_confirm_description: Please re-enter the PIN code to confirm it matches your intended input.

screen_onboarding_profile.onboarding_profile_description: We need a few basic details to help your contacts recognize your profile.
screen_onboarding_profile.onboarding_profile_save_changes_button_d: Save your changes to your profile

screen_onboarding_profile_image.onboarding_profile_image_description: Upload a profile image to help your contacts recognize your profile.
screen_onboarding_profile_image.onboarding_profile_image_save_profile_de: Save your profile image to your profile

screen_login.login_description: Create user or login, without using a password
screen_login.login_description_with_password: Create user or login, where you need to use a password

screen_login_magic_link.login_magic_link_description: Enter your email â€“ we will automatically create your account and send you a login link.

screen_login_check_email.login_check_email_description: We have sent you a confirmation to $email. Click the link in the email to confirm your account.

screen_login_forgot_password.forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password

widgets_auth_create_user_form.create_user_form_password_validator_leng: Password must be at least 6 characters

widgets_auth_email_and_password_form.email_and_password_form_password_validat: Password must be at least 6 characters

widgets_auth_forgot_password_form.forgot_password_form_snackbar_password_r: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
